trans-unit.source: Manages user interface in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 管理設計工具中的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: When the BehaviorService is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame.
trans-unit.target: 建立 BehaviorService 時，它將新增半透明視窗的設計工具的框架。

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService can then use this window to render user interface elements, called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, as well as catch all mouse messages.
trans-unit.target: BehaviorService 然後可以使用這個視窗來呈現使用者介面項目，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>物件，以及所有捕捉滑鼠的訊息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: In this way, the BehaviorService can control designer behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，BehaviorService 可以控制設計工具的行為。

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService class supports a behavior stack, onto which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> objects can be pushed.
trans-unit.target: BehaviorService 類別支援行為堆疊，讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>可推入物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the BehaviorService can send the message to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: BehaviorService 時透過透明視窗攔截訊息，可以傳送訊息給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>堆疊的頂端。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓目前推入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>根據不同的使用者介面模式

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService is used to render all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags.
trans-unit.target: BehaviorService 用來呈現所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>物件，例如選取範圍的框線，調整大小控點和智慧標籤。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting.
trans-unit.target: BehaviorService 也會控制許多設計階段行為，例如使用對齊線，拖曳和選取。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[行為服務概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Adorners property provides access to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 裝飾項屬性提供的存取權<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>受<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>

trans-unit.source: A collection of adorner.
trans-unit.target: 裝飾項集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>裝飾項視窗。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>裝飾項視窗。

trans-unit.source: Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in the adorner window to screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 將轉譯<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>中裝飾項視窗為螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>来轉換值。

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>螢幕座標中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the adorner window in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得螢幕座標中裝飾項視窗的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location, from the upper-left corner of the adorner window, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 從螢幕座標中裝飾項視窗的左上角位置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>開始拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the BeginDrag event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>立即開始拖放作業之前引發 BeginDrag 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的周框<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame.
trans-unit.target: 裝飾項視窗為透明的視窗位於設計工具的框架頂端。

trans-unit.source: This window is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to intercept all messages.
trans-unit.target: 此視窗由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>攔截所有的訊息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: 它也可做為要繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>統一畫布

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>轉譯。

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> translated to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 週框<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>翻譯成裝飾項視窗座標。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> translated to adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>翻譯成裝飾項視窗座標。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>轉譯。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating the location of c in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A 值，指出的位置 c 中裝飾項視窗座標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the behavior stack without removing it.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>而不移除它的行為堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>行為堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>所佔用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> completes a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>完成拖曳作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the EndDrag event immediately after the drag operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>引發 EndDrag 事件只有在拖曳作業已完成之後，立即。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> immediately after the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>後面指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>行為堆疊中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> preceding the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to be returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>前面<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The immediately after behavior in the behavior stack, or if there is no following behavior.
trans-unit.target: 之後立即 behavior 行為堆疊中或如果沒有任何下列的行為。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 失效的裝飾項視窗<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method forces a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A>方法會強制重新整理所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>物件，並在開啟，所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在裝飾項視窗中，使指定的區域<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Invalidate method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Invalidate 方法將會強制重新整理所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>和所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>依次</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 要使其失效之矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在裝飾項視窗中，使指定的區域<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Invalidate method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Invalidate 方法將會強制重新整理所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>和所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>依次</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 要失效的區域。

trans-unit.source: Converts a point in a handle's coordinate system to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 將裝飾項視窗座標的控制代碼座標系統中的點。

trans-unit.source: An adorner window's handle.
trans-unit.target: 裝飾項視窗的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in a handle's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>的控制代碼座標系統中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>中裝飾項視窗座標。

trans-unit.source: Removes and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 移除並傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Removes the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> from the behavior stack internally maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 移除目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>從內部維護<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>行為堆疊</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to remove from the stack.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>從堆疊移除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> that was removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> ，已從堆疊移除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>堆疊是空的。

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> onto the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: 推播通知<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>行為堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The PushBehavior method is often performed by means of a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: 透過點擊測試<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> ，經常執行 PushBehavior 方法

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to push.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>要推入。

trans-unit.source: behavior is .
trans-unit.target: behavioris .

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> onto the behavior stack and assigns mouse capture to the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 推播通知<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref>堆疊行為，並將滑鼠擷取指派至行為。

trans-unit.source: Pushing a capture behavior is often done through a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: 推送擷取行為通常是為了透過點擊測試<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: If a behavior calls the PushCaptureBehavior method and mouse capture is lost, the behavior's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果行為會呼叫 PushCaptureBehavior 方法，而且滑鼠擷取將會遺失，此行為的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to push.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref>要推入。

trans-unit.source: behavior is .
trans-unit.target: behavioris .

trans-unit.source: Translates a point in screen coordinates into the adorner window coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將轉譯成裝飾項視窗座標的螢幕座標中的點<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>来轉換值。

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value, in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>裝飾項視窗座標中的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於應重新整理目前選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes all selection glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 同步處理所有選取圖像 （glyph）。
